_header: And Diomedes birds they were / Called thereafter
Note: Inserted in two MSS of Lydgate’s Troy Book, 3995.
_description: The Scottish Troy Fragments (A and B) — in couplets

BodDou148.First Lines:
…The kyng when þis consale was doneIn hys hall pryvely
                    rytht sone…
BodDou148.Last Lines:
…Than In his werk al þe endingOf quhiche efter is bot
                    litill thing…
BodDou148.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 218-27; 229-34.

CULKk530.First Lines:
…The kyng when þis counsell was doneIn hys hall pryvely
                    ryght sone…
CULKk530.Last Lines:
…Inne hye went to pryame þe kyngTo certefye hym of this
                    thyng…
CULKk530.Attributed Title: her endis the monk ande begynnis barbour (f. 304v)
CULKk530.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 229-304.
